name: Worldallmovieflix
description: Worldallmovieflix is a Super and Fully Advance Auto-filter-Bot - With Artificial Intelligence + File renaming + Url Shortning + Online FIle Streaming Feature. Thanks to Worldallmovieflix for making it so cool.

CHANNELS.description: Username or ID of channel or group. Separate multiple IDs by space.

ADMINS.description: Username or ID of Admin. Separate multiple Admins by space.

PICS.description: Add some telegraph link of pictures .

LOG_CHANNEL.description: Bot Logs,Give a channel id with -100xxxxxxx

AUTH_USERS.description:
Username or ID of users to give access of inline search. Separate multiple users by space.
Leave it empty if you don't want to restrict bot usage.

AUTH_CHANNEL.description: ID of channel.Make sure bot is admin in this channel. Without subscribing this channel users cannot use bot.

DATABASE_URI.description: mongoDB URI. Get this value from https://www.mongodb.com.

COLLECTION_NAME.description: Name of the collections. Defaults name is Telegram_files. If you are using the same database, then use different collection name for each bot

SLEEP_THRESHOLD.description: Floodwait Sleep timer. Read the readme for more info about this var

WORKERS.description: Number of workers that is to be assigned. Read the readme for more info about this var

PORT.description: Port that you want your webApp to be listened to. Read the readme for more info about this var

NO_PORT.description: If you don't want your port to be displayed. Read the readme for more info about this var

BIND_ADRESS.description: Read the readme for more info about this var  Leave Empty  For heroku

FQDN.description: Read the readme for more info about this var  **Leave Empty for heroku**

LAZY_MODE.description: True - to enable file renaming feature

LAZY_RENAMERS.description: Users id, whom you want to allow file renaming

REQ_CHANNEL.description: To send logs of unavailable contnts

URL_MODE.description: True - 'if you want to enable url shortner' else - false

LAZY_GROUPS.description: Group id whom you want to bypass url

MY_USERS.description: Id of the users whom you want to allow to forward message in file protection mode
